emergency_unlock.description_for_keyholder: Let your wearers buy emergency keys or use a safeword to unlock themselves in case of emergency.
emergency_unlock.description_for_wearer: You can buy emergency keys or use a safeword to unlock yourself in case of emergency.
emergency_unlock.choose_method_description_for_keyholder: Choose the unlock methods you want to offer your wearer. When the session starts, your wearer will be able to choose one of the activated methods.
emergency_unlock.choose_method_description_for_wearer: Choose the unlock method you want to use in case of emergency.
emergency_unlock.emergency_key_item_description_for_keyho: Your wearer can buy emergency keys to unlock themself in case of emergency.
emergency_unlock.emergency_key_item_description_for_weare: Use emergency keys to unlock yourself in case of emergency.
emergency_unlock.emergency_keys_description_for_keyholder: In case of emergency, your wearer can buy keys to end their session and get their combination immediately.
emergency_unlock.emergency_keys_description_for_wearer: In case of emergency, you can buy keys to end your session and get your combination immediately.
emergency_unlock.safeword_description_for_keyholder: Configure a safeword that your wearer can use at any time to end their session and get their combination immediately.
emergency_unlock.safeword_description_for_wearer: Configure a safeword that you can use at any time to end your session and get your combination immediately.
emergency_unlock.emergency_key_configuration_description: Configure the number of keys required for unlocking.
emergency_unlock.let_wearer_choose_number_of_keys: Let your wearer choose the number of keys when the session starts
emergency_unlock.let_wearer_choose_number_of_keys_descrip: Recommended if your lock is public.
emergency_unlock.select_number_of_keys: Select the number of required keys
emergency_unlock.select_number_of_keys_description: You can choose this option if you know your wearer.
emergency_unlock.number_of_keys_required_to_unlock: Number of keys required to unlock
emergency_unlock.total_emergency_keys_required_to_unlock: Total emergency keys required to unlock: {{number_of_keys}} ({{price}})
